This is a sample application for the Android Training class "Displaying Bitmaps Efficiently" (http://developer.android.com/training/displaying-bitmaps/).\n\n
It demonstrates how to load large bitmaps efficiently off the main UI thread, caching bitmaps (both in memory and on disk), managing bitmap memory and displaying bitmaps in UI elements such as ViewPager and ListView/GridView.
Invalid response from server. Please try again later.

Currently Flatlay and the products featured within it can only be purchased and shipped to US and Canadian residents.\n\n We are working hard to support international shipments in 2016 however all users have the ability to create and share collections in anticipation of earning credits to be used at a later time. We will store all credits earned for use in the future!!
Outside of the US & Canada?\nEarn credits now and use them later!
Flatlay only ships to US & Canada Addresses for now.
1 credit for every $1 you spend on flatlay\n
If another user shares an item from your collections with their followers, you split credit commissions at 2.5 credits per $1 spent
Earn 5 credits for every $1 spent by another user from one of your collections.
Failed to get final value of cart. Please try again later.

Purchased Confirmed!
You can track the status in Orders next to My Wallet.

Happy Shopping

we at flatlay work tirelessly to bring you name brand products from authentic merchants. You purchase directly from the merchants so you get to take advantage of the same return and exchange policy as those shopping directly on the merchant’s website, but with the benefit of Flatlay rewards!
fulfillment and shipping of all products for sale on Flatlay are handled by the merchants, not by flatlay.
